name: Fatal Mission 2
overview: So amazed were mission command to hear of your surviving the original Fatal Mission, that they decided you were just the man to send to sector ZZZZZeddityzedzedzed. Of course, normal people hide under their beds when they hear such things, but you just turned up your headphones, pumped up the volume and hit the thrusters. So brave, so daring, so very stupid. You blast into space to face the robot hordes.
